name: ImagiRealms: Weird World
description:
In the 40 years between the two legendary quests, there is yet another story...

When a 24-year-old Braiten McAiden is invited to a Chosen Creator Trial, he eagerly goes to the location to sign up. But on the night of the first day of the trial, a strange villain named Eyerus captures all the Chosen Creators... except Braiten. Now Braiten and his new friends must go on an epic quest to save the Chosen Creators! Bring in the weird with Dennis McAiden's wacky cousin Braiten! Cause some extreme unfortunateness with Joker, master of illusion, magic, lisps, and most of all... throwing colored balls at people! Grind those enemies into EXP with the short-tempered arcade hero Blam! Raise the undead and bust a move or two with the ever-optimistic Zaylee! There's so much to do but so little time! Will these weirdos defeat the great and mighty Eyerus or die trying? Only one way to find out!
